text:
Trace Cyrus is opening up about his ex fiancée, 29-year-old actress Brenda Song.

The 28-year-old musician dropped a new song called “Brenda” on Valentine’s Day (February 14), which is a break-up track dedicated to his former flame.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Trace Cyrus

“This is not the video I intended to release today. But it seemed meant to be since I just got this video last night. I wrote this song last year in Nashville after Brenda & I broke up. Her and I have both moved on and I’m extremely happy for her. She inspired me to write countless songs and was such an important part of my life. I will always cherish songs I have like this one to remind me of our crazy 7 years together,” he wrote on his Instagram.

The two got engaged in 2011, but called it off by 2012.

“When I wrote this song it was my final goodbye as we ended our relationship. I told myself after I wrote this song it would be my last song about Brenda and I’ve kept my word. Music like this is my therapy.”

Listen below!
title: Trace Cyrus Releases 'Brenda,' a Break-Up Track Dedicated to Ex Brenda Song - Listen Now!
